author: Kael (hg_dreamer)
name: ScamDetect
short: ScamDetect Cog to Scan for Scammers
install_msg: Thank you for installing! Use the `[p]scamdetect` or `[p]sd` command to see a list of commands
description: Checks for account age and interaction in a server for a set amount of time and notifies the server if a user is a suspected scammer
